answer: The Runner gains 2. Psych Mike counts the number of times the Runner accesses a card from R&D, not specific cards accessed from R&D. Does the Runner gain credits from Psych Mike for accessing upgrades installed in the root of R&D?
question: ####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) [UFAQ 24](http://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs] If the Runner accesses the same card twice (e.g. running R&D and a [Shiro](/en/card/05019) fires), do they gain 1 or 2?
